revised_title: Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author describes the zoological collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75, focusing on the fish species found in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez. Four fish species are discussed, including an undescribed ray, Raja eatonii, which is characterized by its snout shape, spine distribution, and size. The author also mentions the differences between male and female specimens and the discovery of the ray by the "Challenger" expedition.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
